master1.name: 后备精通 I
master1.description: Unlocks the 'Ask Raidian to scout ahead' option in the 'Concentricity' Encounter

master1.name: 后备精通 I
master1.description: Unlocks the 'Ask Raidian to negotiate' option in the 'Concentricity' Encounter and the 'Let Raidian enter' option in the 'Concentricity' Legend

master4.description: In [Sui's Garden of Grotesqueries], +1 Voucher Conservation Limit when recruited, +1 Candle on the next entry into Sui's Remnant Consciousness

master4.name: Expert Backup II
master4.description: In [Sui's Garden of Grotesqueries], +1 Voucher Conservation Limit and +2 Objective Shield when recruited, +1 Candle and randomly explores 1 node on the next entry into Sui's Remnant Consciousness

master5.name: Expert Fighter I
master5.description: In [Sui's Garden of Grotesqueries], Raidian gains the following effects with every new floor you enter: Summons have -9 DP Cost, Summons Deployment Limit +1

master5.description: In [Sui's Garden of Grotesqueries], Raidian gains the following effects with every new floor you enter: Summons have -9 DP Cost, Summons Deployment Limit +2, Summons gain +20 ASPD

master5.name: Expert Fighter I
master5.description: In [Sui's Garden of Grotesqueries], Raidian gains the following effects with every new floor you enter: Summons have -9 DP Cost, Summons Deployment Limit +2, Summons gain +35 ASPD and no longer use Deployment slots
